body:
We should add glob support for `install`/`install_tree`/`copy`/`copy_tree`.

<!--*Please add a concise summary of your suggestion here.*-->

### Rationale

<!--*Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe it!*-->

I see a lot of packages using syntax like:
```python
for files in glob.glob('*.h'):
    install(files, prefix.include)
```
### Description

<!--*Describe the solution you'd like and the alternatives you have considered.*-->
It would be nice if you could instead do:
```python
install('*.h', prefix.include)
```
title: install/install_tree: glob support
